title: Piensa Rápido VIP
overview: Piensa Rápido VIP brings together well-known entertainment personalities to compete in lightning-fast duels and cognitive challenges that put their mental agility to the test under pressure. Each celebrity will compete to advance through multiple rounds and earn points for their team.In each episode, celebrity led teams will go head-to-head in rapid fire rounds featuring multiple choice questions, creative puzzles, and quick-thinking challenges. Correct answers earn points, while wrong moves could cost teams their place in the game. Only the sharpest and fastest contestants will make it to the final round. But it is not just about winning; the celebrities will be playing for a cause. As in other Univision VIP formats, the prize money earned through correct answers will be donated to a family or organization with a meaningful story, adding an emotional and impactful layer to the competition.
